name: Local Island
description:
Local Island is a 2D adventure game in which you have to complete the different missions that the characters want you to do. 

You don't have to do all of them, because you can leave the island by defeating the deep sea fish that is located in the Purple Reef Zone 2.

The player can get new abilities by killing enemies and collecting coins to gain experience and level up.

You can unlock the water bullets, the crounch, and you can also unlock the ability of shooting water bullets a 50% quicker.

The game contains 10 zones, if you want to complete the game with a 100%, you will have to get the two stars that are in the credits section. One for defeating the deep sea fish, and other one for passing the Ice Mountain Zone 2.

The controls are:

  • Move with A and D
  • Jump with the space
  • Shoot with W (level 5)
  • Crounch with S (level 10)
  • Swim with WASD

The most part of the game was made by me, Gold356, but also DarkZ716 helped me creating some sprites for the game.
